main event: A pilot observed an unidentified flying object near Hastings, Minnesota on December 12, 1951.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing an object that resembled a kite at first,The object later appeared round and white, giving the illusion of spinning,The pilot attempted to close in on the object but lost sight of it,The estimated speed of the object was between 320 to 500 mph,Visibility was exceptionally good during the observation.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling a kite, later described as round and white
